column4: Im running ubuntu server on an old pc with no moniter or keyboard. I control the system via ssh from my kubuntu box. I want to run a command on the server that takes about a week to finish, but I don't want to keep my kubuntu box up and running the whole week. Is there a way I can get the command to run, log out from the server, and log back in perodically to check on it?
yes. You can use GNU screen, or you can run it as a cron job, etc.
Thanks, ill look into cron job. Whats GNU screen?
man screen for more information about screen. It's a very useful tool.
